name: Harry Potter And The Deathly Hallows: Parts One And Two (Ultimate Collector's Edition) (Blu-ray + DVD + UltraViolet) (Widescreen)

reviews.name: Harry Potter And The Deathly Hallows: Parts One And Two (Ultimate Collector's Edition) (Blu-ray + DVD + UltraViolet) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: This is a great movie, I would recommend for any dvd collection and scifi fan.
reviews.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

reviews.name: Harry Potter And The Deathly Hallows: Parts One And Two (Ultimate Collector's Edition) (Blu-ray + DVD + UltraViolet) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Love the extras that come with the movies and having both part 1 & 2 together! Would recommend to anybody that loves the Harry Potter movies!
reviews.title: Great for Harry Potter Fans

reviews.name: Harry Potter And The Deathly Hallows: Parts One And Two (Ultimate Collector's Edition) (Blu-ray + DVD + UltraViolet) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Absoutely love it! I now have all of the Harry Potter books (paper and Hardback), all the Audio books and everyone of the movies plus the Ultimate Edition set. Now all I need is each book in the Kindle edition and I will have everything Harry Potter! Thank you J.K. Rowlings for writing such a wonderful series of book that introduces hundreds of adults and children to the wonders of reading!
reviews.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Ultimate Edit

reviews.name: Harry Potter And The Deathly Hallows: Parts One And Two (Ultimate Collector's Edition) (Blu-ray + DVD + UltraViolet) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Got to have it. it's all rolled into one package.
reviews.title: Everything in one package

reviews.name: Harry Potter And The Deathly Hallows: Parts One And Two (Ultimate Collector's Edition) (Blu-ray + DVD + UltraViolet) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Rounds out my collection and at a good price!
reviews.title: Must have for Harry Potter Fans
